mapper.sql: id, uuid, code, type_code, teacher_code, classes_code, start_time, length, create_user, DATE_FORMAT( create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS create_time, update_user, DATE_FORMAT( update_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS update_time
mapper.insert:
insert into t_lesson
uuid, code, type_code, teacher_code, classes_code, start_time, length, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, intro,
#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teacherCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classesCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{length,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STR_TO_DATE( #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STR_TO_DATE( #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), #{intro,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update t_lesson
type_code = #{typeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
teacher_code = #{teacherCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
classes_code = #{classesCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
